messages.1000096332: #wHeals with the power of light. Recovers own HP and allies' HP by a certain amount.\n#yHP Recovery\nMax HP's {0}%
messages.1000072308: Lightning Relic is added with regular electric field nearby.\n#yElectric field ATK (Magical ATK's {0}%)
messages.1000092301: Casts lightning bolts around the {0}m range of the relic summoned by the caster, attacking the enemies near the relic.\n#yMagic Damage per relic {1}%
messages.1000072298: Heal Relic's heal area is increased and besides the healing effect, all damages received will be reduced for {0} sec.\n#yAll damages reduced by {1}%\nHeal area {2}m
messages.1000072302: Cure Relic's effective area is increased and own debuffs are removed immediately after the skill is used. Enemies are pushed away when it appears.
messages.1000072450: Effect area of Bind Relic is increased and damages received by nearby enemies is increased.\n#yDamages received by nearby enemies increased by {0}%
messages.1000059824: Movement speed will be increased when relic type of skills are used.\n#yDuration: {0} sec\nMovement speed: +{1}%
messages.1000077111: Shock Relic is enhanced. 2 lightning damages will be dealt. The amount of damage for each lightning will be unchanged.
messages.1000093715: When #y[Holy Shield]#w is used, Mana is recovered every 2 seconds by {0}% for {1} seconds. \n\n#yOwn Magical ATK increased by {2}%
messages.1000090382: The percentage of the summoner's Max HP applied on the Relic is greatly increased. Additionally, damage received by the relic is reduced, and an electric field is created at a regular interval near the Lightning Relic.\n#yElectric Field ATK ({0}% of Magical ATK)
messages.1000096349: The percentage of the summoner's Max HP applied on the Relic is greatly increased. Also, the amount of damage received by the Relic is reduced, area is increased, and allies' MP is recovered by a certain amount.\n#yRecovery area {0}m\n#yRecovers {1}% of total MP
messages.1000090384: The percentage of the summoner's Max HP applied on the Relic is greatly increased. Additionally, damage received by the relic is reduced, increase in movement speed is added to the skill effects, and the applicable area is increased. Also, debuffs on oneself are removed immediately when the skill is used and nearby enemies are pushed away.\n#yMovement speed increased by {0}%
messages.1000090385: The percentage of the summoner's Max HP applied on the Relic is greatly increased. Additionally, damage received by the relic is reduced, damage received by nearby enemies is increased, and the applicable area is increased.\n#yDamages received by nearby enemies increased by {0}%
messages.1000093933:
#y[Striking] skill is enhanced
#wIf #y[Lightning Relic EX]#w's Relic is installed nearby, you can summon #y[Small Relic]#w by entering #y[Normal Attack Button]#w after using #y[Striking]#w. #y[Small Relic]#w immediately deals {0} times the damage of #y[Lightning Relic EX]#w's total damage to nearby enemies.

#y[Relic] skill is enhanced
#wMovement speed increases when Relic type of skill is used.
#yMovement Speed increased by {1}%

messages.1000076726: Shock Relic is enhanced. 3 lightning damages will be dealt.  The amount of damage for each lightning will be unchanged.
